name: Every 10 seconds (Ache Games (H-Games))
description:
The level will restart every ten seconds if you don't get to the next safe zone.

(If you go back to safe zone, the time will reset.)

Controls

A,S,D,W  for directions

SPACE key to jump (twice for double jump)

** if there is No sound or if the game gets glitchy on the web, i suggest you to download the compressed file.
